clinical_study.brief_title: Pulmonary and Cardiac Ultrasound During Weaning From Mechanical Ventilation
clinical_study.official_title: Pulmonary and Cardiac Ultrasound During Weaning From Mechanical Ventilation

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective observational clinical multicentric study in ICU with ventilated patients requiring chest ultrasound analysis.

detailed_description.textblock: Prospective observational clinical multicentric study on ICU ventilated patients requiring chest ultrasound analysis during weaning from mechanical ventilation with 48 hours of follow-up. Studying variations of cardiac markers

primary_outcome.measure: Compare the change in pulmonary aeration during the test of weaning from mechanical ventilation (before, at the end, and 4-6 h after) between patients requiring re-ventilation before the 48th hour, and those weaned permanently.
primary_outcome.time_frame: before, at the end, and 4-6 h after
primary_outcome.description: Compare the change in pulmonary aeration during the test of weaning from mechanical ventilation (before, at the end, and 4-6 h after) between patients requiring re-ventilation before the 48th hour, and those weaned permanently.

secondary_outcome.measure: Studying variations, during weaning from mechanical ventilation, of pressure of left ventricle filling (E / Ea) coupled with those of plasma BNP.
secondary_outcome.description: Studying variations, during weaning from mechanical ventilation, of pressure of left ventricle filling (E / Ea) coupled with those of plasma BNP.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessing the effects of E / Ea and BNP variations on the success or failure in the 4-6 early hours.
secondary_outcome.description: Assessing the effects of E / Ea and BNP variations on the success or failure in the 4-6 early hours.

secondary_outcome.measure: Compare the variations of lung ultrasound score during the test of the weaning from mechanical ventilation between patients failed the spontaneous breathing test (SBT) and those extubated after successful SBT.

study_pop.textblock: Prospective observational clinical multicentric study on ICU ventilated patients requiring chest ultrasound analysis during weaning from mechanical ventilation with 48 hours of follow-up. Studying variations of cardiac markers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients ventilated more than 48 h
- Stable respiratory and hemodynamic conditions for SBT
- Consent of patients
- Arterial line
Exclusion Criteria:
- Laryngeal dyspnea
- Tracheostomy
- Arythmya
- No echogenicity
- Paraplegia >T8
